content.description: Hold Me Tight is a high quality slab climb which begins at the northeast corner of Evolution Rock. It follows a line of weakness up and left past three widely spaced bolts (all in good condition as of March, 2010). The crux involves a rather improbable series of moves on steep smears with little to pull on with your hands.
content.protection: 3 Bolts. Medium 1 to 2 inches for the anchor (on the top of the formation) or larger 2-3+ inches gear for a lower anchor. An optional 0.5+/- inch piece can be placed to protect getting to the first bolt.
content.location: This climb begins on NE corner and heads up and across the east face. Receives early morning sun, afternoon shade.
